37#include <sys/cdefs.h>
38__RCSID("$NetBSD: mech_external.c,v 1.3 2011/02/11 23:44:43 christos Exp $");
39
40#include <saslc.h>
41#include <string.h>
42
43#include "mech.h"
44#include "saslc_private.h"
45
46/* See RFC 2222 section 7.4. */
47
48/* properties */
49#define SASLC_EXTERNAL_AUTHZID SASLC_PROP_AUTHZID
50
51/**
52 * @brief doing one step of the sasl authentication
53 * @param sess sasl session
54 * @param in input data
55 * @param inlen input data length
56 * @param out place to store output data
57 * @param outlen output data length
58 * @return MECH_OK - success,
59 * MECH_STEP - more steps are needed,
60 * MECH_ERROR - error
61 */
62/*ARGSUSED*/
63static int
64saslc__mech_external_cont(saslc_sess_t *sess, const void *in, size_t inlen,
65 void **out, size_t *outlen)
66{
67
68 return saslc__mech_strdup(sess, (char **)out, outlen,
69 SASLC_EXTERNAL_AUTHZID,
70 "authzid is required for an authentication");
71}
72
73/* mechanism definition */
74const saslc__mech_t saslc__mech_external = {
75 .name = "EXTERNAL",
76 .flags = FLAG_NONE,
77 .create = saslc__mech_generic_create,
78 .cont = saslc__mech_external_cont,
79 .encode = NULL,
80 .decode = NULL,
81 .destroy = saslc__mech_generic_destroy
82};
83
